tool_description: An API made up of multiple news outlets around the world to bring updates related to the Covid-19 Pandemic
name: CrifCovidAPI
title: CrifCovidAPI

api_list.name: Get All Covid News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news on Covid-19 Pandemic!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crifcovidapi.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crifcovidapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crifcovidapi.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crifcovidapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
